events.message: We have received the candidate's application for the Software Engineer role, including their resume and cover letter.
The application has been reviewed and categorised under the Engineering department for further processing.
A recruiter specializing in engineering roles has been assigned to manage the candidate's recruitment process.
Initial phone screening was conducted to assess the candidate’s basic technical knowledge and communication skills.
The candidate responded promptly to the screening outcome and expressed strong interest in proceeding to the technical interview.
The technical interview has been scheduled for next week to evaluate the candidate’s coding and problem-solving skills in detail.
Candidate completed the technical interview successfully, demonstrating solid knowledge in software development and problem solving.
An HR interview has been scheduled to discuss the candidate’s cultural fit, career goals, and compensation expectations.
HR interview was completed positively with agreement on the candidate’s alignment with company culture and values.
An offer was proposed to the candidate with competitive salary and benefits aligned to the engineering role.
Candidate gave positive feedback about the offer and expressed enthusiasm about joining the engineering team.
The candidate accepted the job offer officially and confirmed the starting date for onboarding.
The onboarding process began successfully with the candidate completing all necessary documentation and introductions.
The recruitment process has been completed and the candidate was officially hired as a Software Engineer in the team.
